description: Details required by Condition 10 (CMP) of permission 21/00552/FUL (Proposed part change of use from shop unit to C3 including erection of part two/part three storey building to rear to create 3no. x flats (1x1b,2x2b), demolition of the existing refuse store and replace with new refuse and bike store.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to Condition 10 to safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and in the interests of the safety and operation of the highway network, in accordance with policies T4 and T7 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS7, DM9 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
